channel.title: Making a shop

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

K, I used that ShopMaker, compile all when good. But now when I push Trade it reconnects and shop doesn’t open.

EDIT: Compiler came up with that error again, idk why…I didn’t touch anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

ShopMaker: http://uppit.com/74467V

Download that, it’s a ShopMaker so it will automatically make your shops for you ( You just need to enter the shop number and items ) Simple process.

Creds: JayWalker

Then look in your client.java to make the NPC open the shop with first or second click. Add the npcwannetalk = 0

Read full topic

Only other 519 is this

} else if (NPCID == 519) { // Bob PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 23; // Lumbridge Axe Shop

I deleted that and compiled and still had same error (I re-pasted it back btw).

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“Rockin, post:13, topic:237090”]I just did what Extro told me to do, got another error.

client.java:19123L 'else' without 'if' else if if {NPCID == 519) { // Administrator Shop. ^[/quote]
Not according to your compiler. That shows you have 2 ifs.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

I only got 1 if

else if (NPCID == 519) { // Administrator shop. PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71; }

That’s what I have down.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

You have 2 ifs.

else [b]if[/b] if {NPCID == 519) {

Remove the bold one.

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“Mrs Extro Limited, post:7, topic:237090”][quote author=Rockin link=topic=313068.msg2493087#msg2493087 date=1224256552]
Ok, I added that, now it comes up with an error when I compile.

client.java:18216: code too large public void parseIncomingPacks() { ^

EDIT: Oh and Btw when I click Trade for Bob it D/c’s me and logs me back in quick.
[/quote]
find wanneshop.
Once you have all of the same things click on the last } and paste

else if (NPCID == 519) { // Administrator shop. PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71; }[/quote]

[quote=“Rockin, post:3, topic:237090”]Ok, I added that, now it comes up with an error when I compile.

client.java:18216: code too large public void parseIncomingPacks() { ^

EDIT: Oh and Btw when I click Trade for Bob it D/c’s me and logs me back in quick.[/quote]

item.title: Making a shop

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

A single method in a Java class may be at most 64KB of bytecode. You have put too much shit in the parseIncomingPacks() method.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a shop
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

Ok so I’m trying to make an Admin shop for my Admin zone. My person who is going to sell some items is Bob (the axe dude from lumby).

So I added him to my zone.

This is what I have so far:

in Shops

shop = 71	@whi@Admin Store	2	2	1040	50

in Autospawn

spawn = 519	 2603	     4776	      0	       0	    0	         0	       0	1	     Bob-AdminShop

I read something about Wanneshop in client, and this is what I have, so what do I add after all this?

} else if (NPCID == 1305) { // Agnar Food Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; // Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santas holiday stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; } else if (NPCID == 2253) { // token shop 4 well PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66; } else if (NPCID == 28) { // picks PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 70; } else if (NPCID == 2262) { // dark mage rbe shp PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 32; } else if (NPCID == 944) { // pking shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; } else if (NPCID == 3117) { // armor shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; } else if (NPCID == 166) { // gnome banker PutNPCCoords = true; openUpBank(); } else if (NPCID == 2167) { // team capes 1 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 33; } else if (NPCID == 2619) { // tzhaar banker WanneBank = 3; openUpBank(); // bank } else if (NPCID == 2621) { // the obby caves guy WanneShop = 41; // obby shop } else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 79; // } else if (NPCID == 2168) { // team capes 2 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 34; } else if (NPCID == 462) { // zammy PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 35; } else if (NPCID == 460) { // sara PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 36; } else if (NPCID == 652) { // guthix PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 37; } else if (NPCID == 652) { // guthix PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 37;

Thnx in advanced

Read full topic
